title: Add rate limiting to public API endpoints
body:
## Problem

Our public API endpoints are vulnerable to abuse. We need to implement rate limiting to protect the service.

### Requirements
- Limit requests to 100 per minute per API key
- Return 429 Too Many Requests when limit exceeded
- Include rate limit headers in responses (X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Reset)
- Different limits for different endpoint tiers (free vs. premium)

### Technical Notes
- We use FastAPI
- Consider Redis for distributed rate limiting
- Must not significantly impact response latency

### Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Rate limiting middleware implemented
- [ ] Unit tests cover limit scenarios
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] Metrics/logging for rate limit events
